movies.title: The Deer
movies.plot: Wounded by the police, a thief looks up his old friend in order to leave the proceeds of his theft with him. Instead, he finds that his friend is a drug addict. He sticks around to try and help his friend kick the habit; instead, both men are caught in a shootout with the police and...
movies.simplePlot: Wounded by the police, a thief looks up his old friend in order to leave the proceeds of his theft with him. Instead, he finds that his friend is a drug addict. He sticks around to try and ...

biography.bio: Behrouz Vossoughi is one of Iran's most legendary actors. He has over 40 years of experience in the motion picture industry, with featured appearances in more than 90 films. In addition to his work in films, television, radio and theater, Behrouz' performances have earned him recognition at several international film festivals. He was one of the first to play in American and European Co-Productions such as in Caravans (1978) in 1978 co-starring with Anthony Quinn, Jennifer O'Neill (I) and Michael Sarrazin. He was also to play in another American movie called Les héros de Yucca (1970) with Curd Jürgens in 1962. His major films were, of course, Iranian. In Iran, he is still truly a Mega Star and Role model for an entire generation of Iranians in Post Islamic Iran and under the Shah's Pro-American Regime. Co-starring with his future wife, singer and actress Googoosh in a number of films such as Honeymoon (1976) aka the Honeymoon. He is certainly The Iranian actor who paved the road for the new generation of Iranians working today in Iran and aboard.
biography.name: Behrouz Vossoughi

biography.bio: Born in Tehran in 1941. Traveled to the United States in 1967 to study acting at the college of Visual Art but returned home on the recommendation of the film director Masud Kimiai to appear in The Soil (1972), which Kimiai was planning to shoot. This was Gharibian's first serious involvement in cinema as an actor. Before The Soil (1972); however, Gharibian had appeared in a short scene in a previous film by Kimiai, Come stranger (1968), on which he had also collaborated as assistant director. Gharibian's debut feature film as director was Strife at Tasuki, which he made in 1987.
biography.name: Faramarz Gharibian

biography.bio: Nosrat Partovi is an actor, known for The Deer (1974).
biography.name: Nosrat Partovi

biography.bio: Garshasb Raoufi was born in 1933 in Tehran, Iran. He was an actor, known for The Deer (1974), Sarhad (1996) and Se nafar rooy-e khat (1976). He died on December 8, 2007 in Tehran.
biography.name: Garshasb Raoufi

biography.bio: Enayat Bakhshi is an actor, known for Killing Mad Dogs (2001), The Deer (1974) and Khabarname (1987).
biography.name: Enayat Bakhshi

biography.bio: Parviz Fanizadeh is an actor, known for Ragbar (1972), My Uncle Napoleon (1976) and Tight Spot (1974).
biography.name: Parviz Fanizadeh

biography.bio: Fahimeh Amouzandeh is an actress, known for Caravans (1978), The Deer (1974) and Hamsafar (1975).
biography.name: Fahimeh Amouzandeh

biography.bio: Mahbubeh Bayat was born on February 22, 1949 in Mashhad, Iran. She is an actress, known for Mother (1991), Dar emtedad shab (1978) and Sarab (1986).
biography.name: Mahbubeh Bayat

biography.bio: Jahangir Forouhar is an actor, known for Dash akol (1971), Dar emtedad shab (1978) and Desiderium (1978).
biography.name: Jahangir Forouhar

biography.bio: Nematollah Gorji (1926, Tehran - 2000, Tehran) was an Iranian theatre and film actor. Mr Gorji acted in at least 94 Iranian films, some of which have come to be ranked amongst the most celebrated Iranian films of the 1970s. His last role was that of an old and kind-hearted gardener-caretaker in The Pear Tree (Derakht-e Golaabi), 1998, directed by Dariush Mehrjui.
biography.name: Nematollah Gorji

biography.bio: Mastaneh Jazayeri is an actress, known for The Kiss on Blood Lips (1973), Bi-neshan (1976) and Samad in the Way of Dragon (1977).
biography.name: Mastaneh Jazayeri

biography.bio: Ali Akbar Mahdavifar is an actor, known for Kaka siah (1973), Sine-chak (1977) and Bot (1976).
biography.name: Ali Akbar Mahdavifar

biography.bio: Manoocher Naderi is an actor, known for Les héros de Yucca (1970), The Deer (1974) and The Golden Village (1965).
biography.name: Manoocher Naderi

biography.bio: Saeed Pirdust is an actor and assistant director, known for The Winning Card (2004), Ghazal (1975) and The Lead (1988).
biography.name: Saeed Pirdust

biography.bio: Amrollah Saberi is an actor, known for The School We Went to (1980), The Postman (1972) and Chehre (1995).
biography.name: Amrollah Saberi
